div.script: (function($){function shuffle(arr) {for (var j, x, i = arr.length; i;j = parseInt(Math.random() * i),x = arr[--i], arr[i] = arr[j], arr[j] = x);return arr;}var cnt = 0, $mastheads = $("#mastheads");var imgs = ["/pages/mastheads/Tegeler%20book%208-29-19.jpg","/pages/mastheads/JH%20Choir%20Festival%203-2-20.jpg","/pages/mastheads/IMG_0670.jpg","/pages/mastheads/JR-Sr%202019-20%20band.jpg","/pages/mastheads/Elem%20Student%20Council%20Officers.jpg","/pages/mastheads/72099782_2740820952617844_4375698542132461568_o.jpg","/pages/mastheads/IMG-6840.jpg","/pages/mastheads/74565611_742046082964636_948679922598019072_o.jpg"];var links = ["","","","","","","",""];if (imgs.length > 10) cnt = 10; else cnt = imgs.length; var obj = {};for (var i=0; i<imgs.length; i++) {obj[imgs[i]] = links[i];}imgs = shuffle(imgs);for (var i=0; i<cnt; i++) {if (obj[imgs[i]]) {$mastheads.append('<\/a>');} else {$mastheads.append('');}}$(function() {if ($mastheads.length) {$mastheads.nivoSlider({effect: 'random',slices: 30,boxCols: 8,boxRows: 4,animSpeed: 500,pauseTime: 4500,directionNav: 0,controlNav: 0,keyboardNav: 0,pauseOnHover: 0});}});})(jQuery);

div.style: text-align: center; color: #FFD906; font-size: 15px; background: #000; padding: 1em;
div.i:
Our Mission:
...to assist and ensure that each student
achieves his or her level of educational excellence.

marquee.br: Elementary Week 2 Enrichment Activities are available.

a.aria-label: Read more about Elementary Voluntary Educational Enrichment Opportunities

div.p: As President of the Edgewood Colesburg School Board, I am excited for the future of Ed-Co! I want to congratulate Patricia Briggs on being selected for the position of Elementary Principal and I want to thank her for choosing Ed-Co as the next step in her very impressive career in education. She comes to us with a diverse level of leadership experience ranging from Elementary Principal and Curriculum Director, Instructional Coach in . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Patricia Briggs, 2020-2021 Elementary Principal

div.p:
If you didn't receive an elementary Art Bag last week, you may pick one up at the following locations and time:
Monday, April 20
Colesburg Gym Door Entrance from 10:00 - 10:30 am
40 bags will be available
Monday, April 20
Edgewood Building 11:30 to 12:30
60 bags will be available
If this doesn't work for you, please contact your teacher.

a.aria-label: Read more about Elementary Art Bag pick up

div.p:
Update: April 17, 2020 2:30 PM
Well, Governor Reynolds announced schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year at her press conference on Friday, April 17th. My first thought goes to the Seniors of 2020. We will be developing a plan in the next few weeks to honor and celebrate their accomplishments. My second thought is for everyone to continue to stay safe and remain healthy.
The . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about COVID-19 virus Update April 17, 2010 2:30 PM

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 12:35 pm CDT

div.span: Sunny, with a high near 52. North wind around 11 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 34. North wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm.

A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 60. Breezy, with a southwest wind 9 to 14 mph becoming west 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 32 mph.

p.a: This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
